alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Lynn Canal; Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 04 at 1:47AM AKST until February 04 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 15 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Haines, Haines Highway, Skagway, Dyea, and the Klondike Highway to White Pass. * WHEN...From 6 AM Thursday to 6 PM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Wet snow may be difficult to manage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Another round of heavy snow is ongoing across Upper Lynn Canal through Friday evening. Expect areas near sea level to transition to rain Friday evening before precip diminishes Friday evening. Confidence is lower regarding the exact timing of the change over to rain. An earlier or later transition time may effect total snowfall amounts at sea level.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Lynn Canal; Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway
